name: Galaxy Hawk Alien Fire Shooter
description:
Pew Pew Pew shot laser and train to defeat big boss ! :D

Take control of a spaceship traveling through a hostile, galaxy. Battle a huge variety of enemy ships and bosses,

Face off with bosses, all with their own unique abilities and weaknesses. Get ready for exciting new missions, powerful enemies, and breathtaking boss battles!

FEATURES
◉ Atmospheric levels with diverse missions to complete
◉ Memorable battles with enormous bosses
◉ Upgrade your shield, machine gun, super weapon, nuclear


Use power-ups and your skill to get a prize, what is the prize ?
Endless space fame! now thats something to fight for

So download now for free and blast THEM ALL!!!!!!!!
